member.name: T:Orleans.Serialization.ProtobufSerializer
member.summary: An implementation of IExternalSerializer for usage with Protobuf types.

member.name: M:Orleans.Serialization.ProtobufSerializer.Initialize(Orleans.Runtime.Logger)
member.param: The logger to use to capture any serialization events

member.name: M:Orleans.Serialization.ProtobufSerializer.IsSupportedType(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines whether this serializer has the ability to serialize a particular type.
member.param: The type of the item to be serialized
member.returns: A value indicating whether the type can be serialized
